thread.title: 21 Savage Burns From "The Golden Girls" That We’re Still Recovering From
thread.title_full: 21 Savage Burns From "The Golden Girls" That We’re Still Recovering From

author: Brian Galindo
title: 21 Savage Burns From "The Golden Girls" That We’re Still Recovering From
text:
View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492253 2. When Dorothy pointed out that the apple doesn’t fall very far from the tree: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492273 3. When Blanche was having NONE of Rose’s optimistic attitude: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492440 4. When Sophia quickly put a damper on Blanche’s seduction: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492265 5. When Dorothy got REAL about caring for Sophia: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492333 6. When Sophia thanked Blanche in her own special way: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492554 7. When Sophia took an opportunity to burn Dorothy on her way to a date: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492336 8. And when she took an opportunity to burn Dorothy when just asking a question: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492637 9. When Sophia drew this comparison: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492304 10. When one of Blanche’s stories was too much, even for Dorothy: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492327 11. When Sophia knew Rose, Dorothy, and Blanche’s real worth: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492601 12. When Sophia issued this harsh jab: https://the-goldengirls.tumblr.com/post/43043019536 View this embed › 
ID: 10492679 13. When Sophia was happy to point out her love life did NOT include contracting chlamydia or gonorrhea: NBC/ Disney
NBC/ Disney
  ID: 10492938 14. When Rose called out Blanche on how she likes to party: https://golden-girls-love-cheesecake.tumblr.com/post/18080974830/favourite-golden-girls-moments-no-particular View this embed › 
ID: 10492980 15. When Dorothy was having NONE of Blanche’s nonsense: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10493353 16. When Rose admitted she was partially wrong: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10493029 17. When Blanche ALMOST paid a compliment to Rose: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10493456 18. When Rose offered Dorothy some words of support: https://the-goldengirls.tumblr.com/post/78690518212 View this embed › 
ID: 10493464 19. When Dorothy wasn’t afraid to be brutally honest about Blanche’s awkward childhood stage: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10493472 20. When Sophia pointed out that Dorothy’s sex life was nothing to write home about: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10493562 21. And finally, when Dorothy savagely called out Blanche’s bold-faced lie: View this image › 
NBC/ Disney ID: 10492813
